column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: expert. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```ttl@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .@prefix expert: <http://www.example.com/expert#> .expert:Expert rdf:type rdfs:Class ;expert:hasExpertise rdf:type rdf:Property ;  rdfs:domain expert:Expert ;  rdfs:range rdfs:Literal .expert:hasExperienceYears rdf:type rdf:Property ;  rdfs:domain expert:Expert ;  rdfs:range xsd:int .expert:hasAccomplishments rdf:type rdf:Property ;  rdfs:domain expert:Expert ;  rdfs:range xsd:string .expert:worksInField rdf:type rdf:Property ;  rdfs:domain expert:Expert ;  rdfs:range expert:Field .expert:Field rdf:type rdfs:Class ;  rdfs:label "Field"^^xsd:string .  expert:DomainExpert rdf:type rdfs:Class ;  rdfs:subClassOf expert:Expert ;  rdfs:comment "A Domain Expert is an expert with expertise in a specific field or industry"^^xsd:string .expert:TechnicalExpert rdf:type rdfs:Class ;  rdfs:subClassOf expert:Expert ;  rdfs:comment "A Technical Expert is an expert with expertise in a specific technology or tool"^^xsd:string .```
